english.segment1: Over all the earth You reign on high. Every mountain stream, every sunset sky. But my one request, Lord my only aim. Is that You reign in me again
english.segment2: Lord reign in me, reign in Your power. Over all my dreams, in my darkest hour. You are the Lord of all I am. So won't You reign in me again
english.segment3: Over every thought, over every word. May my life reflect the beauty of my Lord. Cause You mean more to me than any earthly thing. So won't You reign in me again
